name: Trick and Death
description:
Average playtime: 10 minutes.

CAUTION: The game contains loud sounds.

The game has 3 endings.

This is what a 80s halloween were like, when there are no monsters but You, a simple child.

Controls:

WWalk ForwardAWalk the the leftSWalk backwardsDWalk to the rightEInteractL-Shift + WRunLeft Mouse ClickExtra interaction
